connectionStrings.verificationDb: <Inject connection string to SQL server per env for release>

ApplicationInsights._InstrumentationKey: <Inject instrumentation key for AI per env for release>
ApplicationInsights._ConnectionString: <Inject connection string for AI per env for release>

idPorten.clientId: <Inject client secret per env for release>
idPorten.clientSecret: <Inject client secret per env for release | for dev: dotnet user-secrets set idporten:clientSecret your-client-secret>

msis.baseUrl: <Inject MSIS URL per env for release>
msis.certId: <Inject name of MSIS client cert in key vault per env for release (if certificates.locator=local: use thumbprint)>

signingCredentials.certificate: <Inject name of cert in key vault per env (if certificates.locator=local: use thumbprint)>

azureVault.vaultUri: <Inject key vault uri per env if locator=azure>

pseudonyms.key: <Inject base64 representation of key used for hashing ID-porten pseudonyms>
